title: Dispelling the Urban Myth of US Fossil Fuel Subsidies
description: What lies behind competing estimates of US fossil fuel subsidies, and how have federal energy incentives shifted in recent years?

title: Ancient pot discovery sparks treasure claims in Rajasthan
description: Rajasthan: Ancient pot discovered; Archaelogy Department to investigate treasure claims

title: Ancient submerged walls hint at lost Atlantic settlement
description: Stone structures lying beneath the Atlantic off the western coast of France have drawn renewed scientific attention, with researchers saying the scale and organisation of the remains point to a large human settlement dating back about 7,000 years. The find centres on a sprawling network of granite walls resting on the seabed, including a continuous section extending close to 400 feet, assembled from megaliths whose combined weight [...]The article Ancient submerged walls hint at lost Atlantic settlement appeared first on Arabian Post.

title: Lantern parade draws new crowds to ancient tradition
description: A lantern parade was introduced to an old English custom for the first time this year.

title: Yami Gautam and Aditya Dhar seek blessings at the ancient Maa Baglamukhi temple in Kangra
description: Yami Gautam and husband Aditya Dhar visited the ancient Maa Baglamukhi temple in Kangra, Himachal Pradesh, to offer prayers and seek blessings. The couple posed for photos at the revered shrine, symbolising a moment of spirituality amid their professional milestones.
